medical_history.chief_complaint: Respiratory failure, growth retardation, and failure to thrive in a 2-month-old girl.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began shortly after birth, with respiratory distress noted at 30 days of age; oxygen saturation ranged between 70-79% while breathing ambient air.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Intrauterine growth retardation, hypoglycemia, thrombocytopenia, respiratory failure, and multiple congenital malformations including patent ductus arteriosus and ventricular septal defect.
medical_history.family_history: Maternal history of seizure disorder, hyperflexible joints, periventricular heterotopia, with a maternal half-aunt also having a seizure disorder; paternal history of depression.
medical_history.social_history: Patient lived with parents and maternal relatives; the mother smoked during pregnancy.
